Paragraph: However , a 38 % remission rate has been recently reported in refractory MCL treated with temsirolimus , a mTOR inhibitor . Here we had the opportunity to study a case of refractory MCL who had tumor regression two months after temsirolimus treatment , and a progression - free survival of 10 months .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| MCL (Mantle Cell Lymphoma) |
| refractory MCL (refractory Mantle Cell Lymphoma) |

Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: However , a 38 % remission rate has been recently reported in refractory MCL treated with temsirolimus , a mTOR inhibitor . Here we had the opportunity to study a case of refractory MCL who had tumor regression two months after temsirolimus treatment , and a progression - free survival of 10 months .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| temsirolimus |
| mTOR |

In the given paragraph, the only two chemical entities mentioned are "temsirolimus" and "mTOR". "mTOR" stands for mammalian target of rapamycin, which is a protein, but in this context, it is often referred to as the mTOR complex or mTOR inhibitors, so it is listed as a chemical entity.

In the given paragraph, only "temsirolimus" is a clear chemical entity. "mTOR" is a protein and is often referred to as a target or a complex, but in this context, it is mentioned in relation to temsirolimus as an mTOR inhibitor, so it is listed as a chemical entity.
